info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 24 at 1:39PM CDT until September 24 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR
info.description:
FFWLZK
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas...
* Until 445 PM CDT.
* At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 5.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Camden... Hampton... Bearden... Stephens... Hermitage... Thornton... Chidester... Harrell... Louann... Highland Industrial Park... Hampton Municipal Airport... Cullendale... Harlow... Ellisville... Lanark... Moro Bay... Moro Bay State Park... Hilo... Poison Springs State Park... Ingalls...
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:45 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:45 PM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Bradley, AR; Calhoun, AR; Ouachita, AR

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:45 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:45 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Bradley, AR; Calhoun, AR; Ouachita, AR
